text: Hi Michael, make sure the *redirect_uri* in your *authorization URL* matches the *redirect_uri* in your API that handles the callback from HubSpot (where ever you are using <https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>).

<@U012W4YEUTX> Thanks for getting back to me. I was able to figure it out after trying multiple things. If anyone else has the problem I put my solution here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/files-v3-files-error/m-p/445451#M44116>
